title: Closures Along Broadway From 6th to 11th Avenues for Bridge Work (City and County of ...
text: ( Source : City and County of Denver , CO) DENVER, CO Â­- A contracted crew is scheduled to pave the Broadway Street bridge over Cherry Creek this Sunday, October 11 , from 8:00am to 5:00pm. Drivers should anticipate a full closure of Broadway
